techmeme.title: Google unveils new AI features for Chromebook Plus devices, says new Chromebook Plus users get a free year of Google One AI Premium, and updates old Chromebooks (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
T-Mobile plans to acquire most of UScellular, including stores, some of the wireless operator's spectrum, and its customers, in a $4.4B deal, including $2B debt (CNBC)
Abu Dhabi-based edtech startup Alef Education, which serves kindergarten to 12th grade, aims to raise up to $515M in an IPO, Abu Dhabi's first IPO of 2024 (Julia Fioretti/Bloomberg)
PayPal plans to build an ad sales business around data generated from users and tracking purchases, and hires ex-Uber ad boss Mark Grether as PayPal Ads SVP (Patrick Coffee/Wall Street Journal)
Chinese government data: foreign-branded smartphone shipments, most of which are iPhones, rose 52% YoY to ~3.5M in April, after stabilizing in March 2024 (Yuan Gao/Bloomberg)
